name: Wesley Given
description:
I am a very honest man. I am actually quite sensitve and very caring . I like to take care of a others when they are down and also like the same in return. I like social events, like camping, fishing, hunting and sight seeing and enjoy people. I like to have fun and a good laugh time to time. I smile a lot and try to make others smile when they are down and out, or just try to pick them up with good positive energy. I am very Energetic, and a man with good sense of Humor.
Looking for a kind, attractive lady, that is affectionate, is concerned about others more then herself, energetic, sharing, passionate, playful, happy, doesn’t mind getting dirty, loves to dress up, romantic, silly, loves to laugh, is very affectionate and intimate, one that will be a good friend and lover. I would enjoy a lady that is engaging with a good work and sure of herself. Someone that love to hold hands , kissing, visit new place for holidays, loyal, who is ready to commit to a long lasting relationship.
